original_text: And concerning the children of Israel and Judah, that dwelt in the cities of Judah, they also brought in the tithe of oxen and sheep, and the tithe of holy things which were consecrated unto the Lord their God, and laid them by heaps.
korean_text: 유다 여러 성읍에 사는 이스라엘과 유다 자손들도 소와 양의 십일조를 가져왔고 또 그들의 하나님 여호와께 구별하여 드릴 성물의 십일조를 가져왔으며 그것을 쌓아 여러 더미를 이루었는데

sentences.original_text: And concerning the children of Israel and Judah
that dwelt in the cities of Judah
they also brought in the tithe of oxen and sheep
and the tithe of holy things
which were consecrated unto the Lord their God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그들의 하나님 여호와께 구별된 것이며
